DOC.brief_summary: By study , researcher hope learn follow : - If provide hyperbaric oxygen ( HBO ) therapy prior umbilical cord blood ( UBC ) transplant help improve home process - The safety HBO administration set UBC transplant - The effect HBO therapy engraftment process
DOC.brief_title: Use Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy Improve Umbilical Cord Blood Stem Cell Homing Subsequent Engraftment
DOC.detailed_description: Research suggest high level erythropoietin ( EPO ) decrease ability infused umbilical cord stem cell home bone marrow . The investigator investigate use hyperbaric oxygen ( HBO ) therapy decrease plasma concentration EPO prior UBC transplant evaluate result impact UBC homing .
DOC.criteria: Voluntary write informed consent Subjects must > /= 17 yr < /= 70 yr nonmyeloablative transplant Subjects must > /= 17 yr < /= 55 yr myeloablative transplant Subjects Acute Myeloid Leukemia ( AML ) , Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia ( ALL ) , Myelodysplastic Syndrome ( MDS ) , Hodgkin 's Lymphoma ( HL ) NonHodgkin 's Lymphoma ( NHL ) consider UCB transplant Use approve form contraception Karnofsky performance status > /= 70 % Adequate hepatic , renal , pulmonary cardiac function . Criteria include : ALT ( alanine aminotransferase ) , AST ( aspartate aminotransferase : < 4x IULN ( institutional upper limit normal ) Total bilirubin < /= 2 mg/dL Serum creatinine < 2.0 mg/dL Left ventricular ejection fraction > /= 45 % FEV1 ( forced expiratory volume ) , FVC ( force vital capacity ) DLCD ( diffuse capacity lung carbon monoxide ) > /= 50 % predict value ( correct serum hemoglobin ) Pregnancy breast feeding Severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease require oxygen supplementation History spontaneous pneumothorax History seizures Claustrophobia Asthma Uncontrolled viral bacterial infection time enrollment Active recent ( prior 6 month ) invasive fungal infection without interdisciplinary consult approval
DOC.keyword: Umbilical Cord Blood ( UCB ) Stem Cell Transplant
